subject: Basketball
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: The Knicks won for the eighth time in nine games, improving their record to 26-25, even as Amar’e Stoudemire recovered from a bulging disk in his back and Jeremy Lin nursed a knee injury.
snippet: The Knicks won for the eighth time in nine games, improving their record to 26-25, even as Amar’e Stoudemire recovered from a bulging disk in his back and Jeremy Lin nursed a knee injury.
